Name: Linear Programming
Description: Method to optimize a linear objective function subject to linear constraints.

Name: Integer Programming
Description: Similar to LP but with integer variables
Solvability: allowing for whole numbers of items.

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Method for solving complex problems by breaking them down into simpler subproblems.

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Optimization technique where the objective function is quadratic and the constraints are linear.

Name: Convex Optimization
Description: A type of optimization problem where the objective function is convex and the constraints form a convex set.

Name: Non-Linear Programming
Description: Optimization problems with nonlinear objective functions or constraints.

Name: Mixed-Integer Linear Programming
Description: A combination of LP and IP
Solvability: where some variables are integers and others are continuous.

Name: Stochastic Optimization
Description: Deals with optimizing a system when there is uncertainty in the parameters or outcomes.

Name: Combinatorial Optimization
Description: Concerned with finding the optimal object from a finite set of objects.

Name: Semi-Infinite Programming
Description: A type of optimization where the number of constraints is infinite.
